/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban architecture and natural elements. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the cityscape.
